news.title: REAL AI Launches Its First AI Bootcamp for High School Students
news.content: REAL AI successfully completed its inaugural three-week AI Bootcamp, engaging 20 high school students in hands-on learning and creative exploration of AI. The program fostered strong student enthusiasm, prompted reflection on future academic pathways, and inspired the announcement of an all-girls AI Bootcamp planned for next summer. Beyond student impact, the bootcamp also proved formative for participating graduate instructors, highlighting its value as both an educational and mentoring experience.

news.title: AI-Driven FTD Research Featured in The Transmitter
news.content: PhD student Louisa Cornelis uses explainable graph neural networks and LLM-assisted analysis to study frontotemporal degeneration, predicting cognitive decline from proteomics data.

news.title: HerBrain: Digital Twin of the Maternal Brain Named TIME's Best Invention
news.content: HerBrain uses machine learning to model weekly structural changes during pregnancy and postpartum, aiming for 2027 launch integration with pregnancy apps.

news.title: AI's Role in Education and the Future of Learning
news.content: Abby Bertics explores how students use AI for essays and problem-solving while universities grapple with adaptation challenges.

news.title: AI for Diabetes Wins ADA Abstract Award 2025
news.content: Researchers developed a model explaining glucose changes during physical activity in type 1 diabetes using data from 1,000+ exercise sessions.

news.title: Maternal Brain AI Receives $1M Chan Zuckerberg Initiative Grant
news.content: Researchers building an AI-powered digital twin of the maternal brain received $1M in funding for women's brain health advancement.

news.title: Dementia Research Receives NSF Graduate Research Fellowship
news.content: PhD student Louisa Cornelis awarded NSF GRFP for graph neural network research with dementia applications.

news.title: Framework for Bias-Free AI Receives NSF CAREER Award
news.content: Prof. Jeong's research eliminating biases in AI models receives prestigious NSF CAREER Award.

news.title: Ann S. Bowers Women's Brain Health Initiative Launches
news.content: Prof. Miolane co-founded WBHI, leveraging AI to accelerate women's brain health discoveries.

news.title: Geometric AI for Imaging Science Receives NSF CAREER Award
news.content: Prof. Miolane's research developing Geometric AI methods to analyze shapes in scientific images receives NSF CAREER Award.
